definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

sentences.english: The research development in catalysts for Syndiotactic polymerization of styrene is re-viewed .
sentences.chinese: 本文综述了制备间规聚苯乙烯用催化剂的研究进展。

sentences.english: A worker pays for a delivery of polystyrene at a recycling center in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 废品收购站里一工人在买聚苯乙烯。

sentences.english: I want to name a baby filly PS I Love You.
sentences.chinese: 我想要个孩子的名字菲伊聚苯乙烯我爱你。

sentences.english: The papers with 57 refs. (to Oct, 1991)reviews the studies of structure and properties of isotactic PS.
sentences.chinese: 本文综述了等规聚苯乙烯的结构与性能的研究。

sentences.english: EPS Packaging Group is part of British Plastics Federation.
sentences.chinese: 可发性聚苯乙烯包装集团是英国塑料同盟的成员。

sentences.english: Plastic bags and Styrofoam are a big environmental hazard in Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 塑料袋和聚苯乙烯是洛杉矶一个大的环境危害。

sentences.english: This paper briefly described the formation cause of polymorphism of syndiotactic polystyrene (sPS) and the method for analyzing the polymorphism of sPS.
sentences.chinese: 概述了间规聚苯乙烯多晶的成因及分析方法。

sentences.english: Carboxylic crosslinked polystyrene microsphere was prepared by F-C acylation reaction.
sentences.chinese: 通过傅克酰基化反应制备了羧基化交联聚苯乙烯微球。

sentences.english: The invention is suitable for the hot melting recycling machine for recycling expanded polystyrene.
sentences.chinese: 本发明适用于回收发泡聚苯乙烯的热熔回收机。

sentences.english: The plastic ball ball is one kind hangs the quantity extremely light polystyrene pellet.
sentences.chinese: 塑料球弹是一种垂量极轻的聚苯乙烯小球。

sentences.english: The monodisperse polystyrene particles were prepared by free radical dispersion polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 用分散聚合方法制备单分散聚苯乙烯微球。

sentences.english: The design replaces a pack that used pre-moulded polystyrene fitments .
sentences.chinese: 设计取代了一包用预先成型的聚苯乙烯生设备。

sentences.english: The paraffins-polystyrene microspheres were synthesized by the method of suspension polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 用悬浮聚合法制备石蜡聚苯乙烯微球。

sentences.english: The distribution of internal stresses through the thickness of injection-moulded polystyrene has been investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了聚苯乙烯注射件中内应力沿厚度的分布。

sentences.english: And the monomer added once in a lump administers is helpful to form the monodisperse polystyrene micro-spheres.
sentences.chinese: 且一次加料有助于形成单分散的聚苯乙烯微球。

sentences.english: A new method for determining the bromine content in brominated polystyrene was studied.
sentences.chinese: 提出了测定溴化聚苯乙烯中溴含量的方法。

definition: phenolic aldehyde/phenolic resin (used to manufacture bakelite)
